lexUnit.name: supposing.scon
lexUnit.definition: FN: (very informal) if (of an unlikely situation).

sentence.text: But I 'm making excuses already , are n't I. Nevertheless , your opinion does concern me ; I mean , supposing you think it 's a pile of dog 's dos ?
` And supposing you prove to be the best match for Donna ?
In fact I wrote a song yesterday & if you are good you shall have it , supposing you care .
Well , that 's always supposing you can get him in the first place , because the number of people who have actually seen him , you can count on one hand . "
So supposing you never marry , and if you go on being so fussy you probably never will -- are there to be no cakes and ale ? "
So , supposing we did get a search warrant , what would we find ?
` You have only to hop over the wall to reach them , supposing their dogs do n't get you . "
` But supposing something happens while we 're gone ? "
And supposing Susan thinks you 're a crook , and goes to the police ? " ,
What about central bankers per head of population -- supposing , which is not obvious , that bigger countries need bigger banks ?
To himself he thought : supposing she is right !
Thus , supposing this product is a substitute for the others , an increase in its output will shift the demand curves for the other products inward .
` No , Jones wo n't be rescuing you , even supposing Nicky is into sharing .
` Nerina , " said Mrs Khalid , ` supposing your brother saw you wearing that T-shirt . "
And Anna Freud said , okay that 's what you called it , but supposing we had to look what you 've just described up in a dictionary , what word would be found ?
` And supposing I did talk to someone about my job ? "
And supposing Elaine does n't like the idea of a daughter from the past turning up ?
But supposing they were right about that , what would then remain of the ERM 's former power to foster low inflation ?
The limit of the inquiry must be whether the magistrates have jurisdiction , supposing the facts alleged in the information to be true .
` Because supposing they do n't catch him and supposing he does escape -- "
